titleStmt.title: To the honourable the knights, citizens, and burgesses in Parliament assembled, the humble petition of George Carew, Esquire, administrator of the goods and chattles of Sr. Paul Pyndar, Knight, deceased (with his will annexed), unadministred by William Toomes
titleStmt.author: Totnes, George Carew, Earl of, 1555-1629.

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication from Wing.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
